title: Vector Paint Tools Unavailable in FontLab 4.5
content:
Why might it be that, when I try to design or edit a character, the Vector Paint Tools are greyed out and unavailable in FontLab 4.5 ?   
   
How can they be restored ?
author: simon_johnson

comments.content:
1. Check if outline layer is not locked (View \> Lock Layers) menu.   
2. Check this option: Preferences \> Glyph \> Do not open Paint/Edit toolbars.   
3. If it will not help, let me know details: yar[at]fontlab[dot]com
